text: Orion is a wealth tech company

that builds software solutions
for financial advisors

and their customers and a
myriad of other offerings
for financial advisors.
Our partnership with AWS

and NetApp has allowed
us to reduce our cost
by 65% for storage.

Along with that, we have
a more resilient platform
for disaster recovery.

So we leveraged Amazon FSx for NetApp
ONTAP to replace our EBS storage
for our SQL server standalone servers,
and we replaced it with a 700 terabyte FSx
for ONTAP file system.

The business value that
FSx for ONTAP brings

to us really has to do with
the cost savings.
Our workload is very spiky,

and so with the pooled
storage, we don't have
to worry about running out of resources,

and this has allowed us to
maintain performance during peak

and then during the
lower down times not have
to pay additional cost for that.

Along with that, the
disaster recovery resiliency

of it being multiple AZs has
allowed us to bring

that peace of mind that
our data's protected
and available in case there is any kind
of unexpected outage.
